ygData.subject: Re: Razel was <-------idiot
ygData.msgSnippet: Well - if this Razel character is in fact a good guy he could show it by making amends.  IMHO - he has a responsibility to rectify the situation.  IMHO -
ygData.messageBody:
Well - if this Razel character is in fact a "good guy" he could show it by
making amends. IMHO - he has a
responsibility to rectify the situation. IMHO - your character is your
character and if you let someone else play it - you are still responsible
for their actions.

If this were to happen to me (and it won't I would NEVER allow someone else
to play my character) - I would do everything and I mean everything in my
power to replace the items including spending all my money and doing the
quests...

Slyde

----- Original Message -----
From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, March 02, 2000 11:09 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] <-------idiot


> From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
>
> Well, I did report it and was told there was nothing that could be (or
would
> be) done about the situation. However, at the end of the night, the gm
> finally asked that I write her an email explaining the situation.
Hopefully
> that will help matters.
>
=
